projects.name: 長榮大學職涯網
projects.depiction: 當初長榮大學的職涯發展組需要一個可以讓學生媒合企業的平台，於是邀請資管系學生幫忙建構網站，網站的規模為資訊系統，具有申請會員、學號第三方登入、上傳工作機會、學生應徵工作、工讀單產生..等功能，使用MS SQL資料庫。

projects.name: 逢甲大學 多媒體暨網路安全實驗室
projects.depiction: 逢甲大學多媒體暨網路安全實驗室的網站，已經搭建幾十年，於2017年進行重建更新，內容為歷屆學生論文上傳、學生論文報告簡報、教授演講簡報..等教學資源，並與張講座個人網站共同經營。

projects.name: 長榮大學ACG研究社 形象網站
projects.depiction: 大量使用當時流行的HTML5設計模式(2014)，特色是利用視差滾動來控制圖片動畫。

projects.name: Ozen's personal website (2014)
projects.depiction: I learned many popular web technologies in 2014. And want to build a personal web page, so did this work. At the time it was using the 'Auto' nickname, and founded the 'Autoplay' brand.

projects.name: Ozen's personal website (2015)
projects.depiction: I remade my personal webpage in 2015. I liked listening to EDM at that time and knew DJ Steve Aoki. Use his film in tomorrowland as the theme of the web.

projects.name: RWD with CSS grid
projects.depiction: 利用CSS3的grid來安排響應式版面，讓網頁內容在電腦螢幕、平板屏幕及手機螢幕上，呈現不同的佈局。

projects.name: Audio visualization use D3.js
projects.depiction: Convert audio coefficients into javascript array. Use D3.js to display array data as SVG graphics.

projects.name: CSS3 Animation
projects.depiction: The ultimate show of CSS3 animation. It’s using the movement, scale, opacity and speedctrl to complete the entire animation.
